faq.title: Answers to the most common questions about our services
faq.subtitle: We know choosing an accounting partner is an important decision. Here are some quick answers to help you understand how Bookiper can support your business.

questions.cost: How much does your service cost?
questions.industries: Do you only work with certain industries?
questions.tax_compliance: Can you handle tax compliance as well?
questions.scalability: What if my company grows — can the plan be adjusted?

answers.cost: Our plans start from 89€/month, but the final price depends on your company size, type, and activity. You can request a personalized quote through our form.
answers.industries: No — we support businesses across different sectors, including retail, IT, consulting, manufacturing, and more.
answers.tax_compliance: Yes. We take care of bookkeeping, financial reporting, and tax compliance to keep your business fully aligned with regulations.
answers.scalability: Absolutely. Our services are flexible and scale with your business as it expands.
answers.getting_started: Simply fill in our form for a personalized offer, and our team will guide you through the onboarding process.
